name: D(Rh)Sensitized
title: D(Rh) Sensitized
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes specifying the D(Rh) sensitized status of a patient.),(Data Element Scope: Values describing the D(Rh) sensitized status of a patient.),(Inclusion Criteria: SNOMED CT codes in the hierarchy below and including 44795003 |Rhesus isoimmunization affecting pregnancy (disorder).),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
